body.name: SIMPLIHOME Connaught SOLID WOOD 40 inch Wide Traditional Entryway Storage Cabinet in Black for the Living Room, Entryway and Family Room
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 4 hrs 26 mins
features: DIMENSIONS: 15" D x 40" W x 36" H
SOLID WOOD: Handcrafted with care using the finest quality Pine
HANDFINISHED in Black with a protective NC lacquer
MULTIPURPOSE CABINET offers plenty of functional storage. Looks great in your living room, entryway, bedroom ,dining room, condo or office.
Features 2 doors with large interior storage and interior adjustable shelves
Traditional style Includes vintage raised panel doors and drawers, notched legs, Bronze decorative hardware and a style reminiscent of the historic British Colonial style
Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography

At Simpli Home we believe in creating excellent, high quality products made from the finest materials at an affordable price. Every one of our products come with a 1-year warranty and easy returns if you are not satisfied
body.description: Your entryway is the main traffic zone of your house. Always people coming and going depositing their keys, hats, shoes, wallets and phones at the front door. What a mess! It is for this reason we designed the Connaught Entryway Storage Cabinet. Two drawers conveniently hold your personal items while the two door cabinet has two adjustable shelves that offer an abundance of versatility to effortlessly organize and store away anything you wish to remain hidden .your secret is safe with us. But don't be limited by our description, this flexible and functional piece can be used in just about any room in your home.; Includes vintage raised panel doors and drawers, notched legs, Bronze decorative hardware and a style reminiscent of the historic British Colonial style; Assembly Required

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid and Great Looking
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this item as well as another piece in the Simplihome Connaught line. Both arrived well packed and without a blemish. The directions were easy to follow, with pictures AND words! The solid wood pieces are beautiful and look more expensive than they were. I hope to purchase more items in this line in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We got this in black to complement some antique Asian painted bookshelves in our library, and it's a beautiful addition. The storage space and size make it a very versatile piece with many potential uses. There were only a few small nicks to the finish that were easily touched up with a fine black Sharpie. One person can assemble it, but it takes a long time as there are a lot of steps. You'll need to create your own drill holes to screw on the back panels or the screws may go in crooked as the wood is solid, which adds more time. I appreciate that stickers that match assembly directions are strategically placed so they will be hidden when fully assembled, so they're not necessary to remove. If you want to remove them, most will not come off easily and will require Goo Gone. If I'd realized this earlier in the assembly process, it would have taken me 3 hours instead of 4 hours to assemble. It was worth the effort, and I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality of this storage cabinet was better than expected
reviews.reviewText: We needed a storage cabinet and had been shopping at the local furniture store for several weeks. I was reluctant to pay $700+ for a decent piece of furniture. This SIMPLIHOME Connaught Table was about half the price, so long as I was willing to spend the time to assemble. No brainer as I am pretty handy.The cabinet came very well packed, no damage whatsoever. Upon inspecting the pieces I was surprised that it is truly solid wood as advertised, (expect the masonite type back). I would say similar size cabinets in the furniture stores often have some pieces that are not even solid wood like this one.Assembly takes some time, but is not difficult if you can follow instructions. I did use a power drill to start pilot holes and to attach screws that cover the back of the unit. The only slight problem was the pins that mount in the inside pre-drilled holes. The holes are slightly undersized compared to the pins. I had to enlarge these holes slightly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and looks very nice!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't find this very hard to assemble, good instructions. Looks very nice. Drawback is the wood and finish is very soft so dents easy. Mine came with right door scratches but not seen when closed - so kept it. Don't know how it happened because it was packaged very well. I'm satisfied with the product and its perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not Worth it
reviews.reviewText: The description says SOLID WOOD, but this is VERY MISLEADING. At least half of it is definitely manufactured wood and super cheap quality. And whatever is real wood is not very good quality. While it does look nice from a far, the finish on the pieces does dent and chip easily.I purchased the Amazon team to assemble it for me (they were GREAT!) but the end product, while it all fits together - isn't very sturdy. Mine is a bit wobbly so I'll have to put something under the legs. I'm also not sure if it's worth disassembling, trying to fit it all back in the box to ship it back.In general, this piece is NOT WORTH THE MONEY. You can find other similar pieces of furniture that are better quality - even though they aren't made out of "solid wood", that are more reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Cabinet
reviews.reviewText: Bought two in black for either side of the fireplace. Relatively easy to assemble - excellent instructions - took about 5 hours for both. Quality and finish is very good for this price point. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice, but has a few flaws.
reviews.reviewText: This arrived on time and assembly wasn't too difficult, with the exception of the doors. As other reviewers mentioned, it was hard to get them level, which makes them difficult to open and close. The wood has 2 areas that appear almost wavy, and it scratches very easily. I'm keeping it, as it fits my space well and looks ok, but if I were buying again I think I'd make another choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Took a while to be put together. Also very easily damaged but it’s a nice piece and it is exactly what I wanted for that area.
